0.text: Lahiru: Ah! There comes the bus. Bye sister! Sister: Bye. Where is your cap ? Lahiru: Oh! I forgot it. Can you get it for me, please? It's on my table. Sister: Here you are. Bye ! Lahiru: Bye !
0.ssml: <speak><prosody rate='slow'><phoneme alphabet='ipa' ph='lahiru'>Lahiru</phoneme>: <break time='200ms'/> Ah! <break time='200ms'/> There <break time='200ms'/> comes <break time='200ms'/> the <break time='200ms'/> bus. <break time='200ms'/> Bye <break time='200ms'/> sister! <break time='200ms'/> Sister: <break time='200ms'/> Bye. <break time='200ms'/> Where <break time='200ms'/> is <break time='200ms'/> your <break time='200ms'/> cap <break time='200ms'/> ? <break time='200ms'/> <phoneme alphabet='ipa' ph='lahiru'>Lahiru</phoneme>: <break time='200ms'/> Oh! <break time='200ms'/> I <break time='200ms'/> forgot <break time='200ms'/> it. <break time='200ms'/> Can <break time='200ms'/> you <break time='200ms'/> get <break time='200ms'/> it <break time='200ms'/> for <break time='200ms'/> me, <break time='200ms'/> please? <break time='200ms'/> It's <break time='200ms'/> on <break time='200ms'/> my <break time='200ms'/> table. <break time='200ms'/> Sister: <break time='200ms'/> Here <break time='200ms'/> you <break time='200ms'/> are. <break time='200ms'/> Bye <break time='200ms'/> ! <break time='200ms'/> <phoneme alphabet='ipa' ph='lahiru'>Lahiru</phoneme>: <break time='200ms'/> Bye <break time='200ms'/> ! <break time='200ms'/></prosody></speak>

2.text: 1. When does Lahiru have scout practices? 2.Who has taken Lahiru's log book? 3. Name the friends who do scouting with Lahiru. 4. Why has Darren not returned Lahiru's book? 5. Why was Lahiru in a hurry to go? 6. What did Lahiru forget to take with him and where was it?
